name: Raoul Pal The Journey Man
title: How Meme Coins Will Take Over | Raoul Pal ft. BEEPLE
text:
Synopsis
Raoul Pal suggests that meme coins and tokenized attention represent a potential economic model for human participation in a post-AGI (Artificial General Intelligence) world, where traditional job structures may become obsolete.

Key Insights
- Tokenization of attention is viewed as a potential new economic mechanism
- The concept involves financializing community purpose and human interaction
- Meme coins are seen as a form of attention economy, ranging from long-term (like Dogecoin) to short-term speculative instruments
- The discussion anticipates significant economic transformation by around 2032
- The proposed model aims to enable "authentic" human economic participation in a potentially automated future
- The approach suggests adaptability in economic engagement through digital tokens and community-driven value creation
